title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 58 - Rear-view Mirrors And Rear Object Detection Devices
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 58 - Rear-view Mirrors And Rear Object Detection Devices

State Regulations
§ 58.1 - Scope
§ 58.2 - Purpose
§ 58.3 - Application
§ 58.4 - Requirements for passenger cars
§ 58.5 - Requirements for multipurpose passenger vehicles, trucks, and buses with gvwr of 10,000 pounds or less
§ 58.6 - Requirements for multipurpose passenger vehicles, trucks, and buses with gvwr of more than 10,000 pounds
§ 58.7 - Mirror construction
§ 58.8 - Rear object detection systems

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. D, pt. 58

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 215, 375[10]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
